div.p: FHIR provides numerous extensions for Questionnaire, many of them related to how the questionnaire should be rendered. SDC includes the sdc-questionnaire-render profile which highlights what extensions are available and where they are intended to be used.

This example highlights most of these extensions and shows how they should be used. This companion PDF shows what a system rendering the Questionnaire according to the extensions included might look like.

ul.li: Questionnaires will be rendered by a variety of tools on a variety of devices. Not all tools will necessarily support all extensions - or even all core elements. Authors should recognize this and only depend on extensions if they're confident that all systems using the Questionnaire will support the needed extensions. Note that this doesn't mean that extensions can't be used, only that the Questionnaire should be safe to use if extensions that the author isn't certain will be supported are not supported.
Tools that use HTML to render forms should consider disabling browser-based auto-completion unless such behavior is is desired
